Reviews.Title: Didnt even arrive
Reviews.Author: d
Reviews.Content: I ordered this and it didn't even arrive. The people who sent it out just kept saying that it would be here soon and three weeks later i had to go to a store and get a phone.... NOT worth it!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
No contract T-Mobile cell phone ready to activate on T-Mobile wireless
Excellent Conditioned Pre-Owned Phone, You Will Be Very Satisfied
Used no contract T-Mobile Cell Phone
Full 30 day customer satisfaction warranty
Please contact us with any questions and we will reply ASAP
ProductInfo.Name: T-Mobile LG Doubleplay No Contract QWERTY Android Smartphone 5MP Camera NEW
